clinical_study.brief_title: Distance From the Glottis to the Grille in Children
clinical_study.official_title: Distance From the Glottis to the Grille in Children: Ambu AuraGainTM , I-gel, Air-Q Intubating Laryngeal Airway as Intubation Conduits

brief_summary.textblock: Ambu AuraGain, I-gel, Air-Q intubating laryngeal airway are the most commonly used supraglottic airway. In children, they can be used as intubation conduits. However, there has been no guideline for optimal insertion depth of endotracheal tube through those supraglottic airway. In this study, the investigators will measure the distance from grille of those supraglottic airways to glottis using fiberoptic bronchoscope in children undergoing anesthesia. This distance allows us to predict an appropriate depth of endotracheal tube when it should be inserted through each supraglottic airway.

primary_outcome.measure: The distance from grille to glottis
primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 seconds after each supraglottic airway insertion
primary_outcome.description: The distance from grille to glottis is measured using fiberoptic bronchoscopy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30 seconds after each supraglottic airway insertion
secondary_outcome.description: score 1: no visible glottis, score 2: visible glottis and anterior epiglottis, score 3: visible glottis and posterior epiglottis, and score 4: only glottis visible

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30 seconds after each supraglottic airway insertion
secondary_outcome.description: no air leak in airway pressure of 15 cmH2O / bilateral chest wall movement/ normal waveform of capnography

arm_group.description: Ambu AuraGain is inserted in children undergoing general anesthesia. The size of AuraGain is as follows: size 1 for children <5 kg, size 1.5 for 5-10kg, size 2 for 10-20kg, size 2.5 for 20-30kg. Fiberoptic bronchoscope will be performed to measure the distance between the grill and vocal cord.

I-gel is inserted in children undergoing general anesthesia. The size of I-gel is as follows: size 1 for children weighing 2-5kg, size 1.5 for 5-12kg, size 2 for 10-25kg, size 2.5 for 25-35kg. Fiberoptic bronchoscope will be performed to measure the distance between the grill and vocal cord.

Air-Q ILA is inserted in children undergoing general anesthesia. The size of Air-Q ILA is as follows: size 1 for children between 4-7 kg, size 1.5 for 7-17kg, size 2 for 17-30kg, size 2.5 for 30-50kg. Fiberoptic bronchoscope will be performed to measure the distance between the grill and vocal cord.

intervention.description: Distance from grille (the end of shaft in supraglottic airway) to glottis is measured using FOB

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- children < 7 years old undergoing elective surgery
Exclusion Criteria:
- difficult airway
- BMI> 30kg/m2
- emergency operation
- cervical spine disease
- history of esophageal disease and surgery
